dmca.title: ip enforcement
dmca.body:
Thanks, Greg. I appreciate it. I was out sick, so I'm sorry we didn't have a chance to talk if you called me this week. Please call me next week at your convenience, if you want to. I would want to find out if there is something you are upset with Yahoo! about, that I might be able to help you resolve.  Otherwise, I appreciate your contacting GoDaddy and will close this file for now. Again, thanks for your honesty and willingness to work with me.
 
Kind regards,
 
jonathan matkowsky |  legal director |  Yahoo! Inc. 

jdm@yahoo-inc.com | o. 408.349.7317 | yahoo! id jonathan.matkowsky

 

NOTE:  This message may be protected by attorney-client and/or work product privileges, if you are not the intended recipient then please delete this message and all attachments and notify me as soon as possible.  Thanks.

 

 



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
From: greg esry [mailto:admin@onlinecasinogamblingportal.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2007 8:21 AM
To: Yahoo! IP Enforcement
Subject: RE: yahoofuckedme.com


I will contact go daddy > That is reasonable for now. I will try to check my notes from the time i first registered this domain. Hope to have time to talk this week. 
 Thank You,
 Greg Esry

Yahoo! IP Enforcement <ipenforcement@yahoo-inc.com> wrote:
Thanks, Greg. Below is my direct dial so we can talk -- I hate to see someone so upset with Yahoo!.  Also, I appreciate your email, and will not pursue this any further for now, if you would have GoDaddy remove the advertisement from the page that is currently being displayed.  Does this seem reasonable to you?
 
Have a nice weekend.
 
Regards.
jonathan matkowsky |  legal director |  Yahoo! Inc. 
 
My direct dial  - 408.349.7317 
 
 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

From: greg esry [mailto:admin@onlinecasinogamblingportal.com] 
Sent: Thursday, September 06, 2007 2:56 PM
To: ipenforcement
Subject: Re: yahoofuckedme.com
 
give me a direct # and time and I will call;. 
 
 
When and if I find it neccessary to create a landing page with this domain ,IT WILL HAVE ABOUSOLUTELY NO COMMERCIAL USE. NO OUTGOING LINKS, NO ADVERTISEING.  
If it does go into use informational website only . ( of my interactions with yahoo Inc )
 
Thank You,
 Greg Esry

ipenforcement <ipenforcement@yahoo-inc.com> wrote:
Hi Greg.
 
I
